name: @stringstack/mongoose
description: StringStack/mongoose is a connection component for Mongoose/MongoDB.

scripts.test: docker-compose --project-name=stringstack-mongoose-test up -d; ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --exit; echo tests complete; docker-compose --project-name=stringstack-mongoose-test down -v;

author: Anthony Hildoer <anthony@stringstack.org>
